data.name: Baccarat Corsair
data.detailed_description:
Baccarat Corsair is 3D game that allows you to experience the excitement of baccarat. In Baccarat Corsair you can enjoy the best gaming experience with stunning graphic and thrilling music. If you don't want to play alone, you can also invite your friends to join your table to play together.
You would also find interesting mini-games and game events for earning free game coins.

Do not miss the chance to have fun and try your luck!

data.short_description: Baccarat Corsair is 3D game that allows you to experience the excitement of baccarat. To enjoy the interesting mini-games, stunning graphic and thrilling music, you can also invite your friends to play together. Do not miss the chance to have fun and try your luck!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: On board display card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5+
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700+ / GeForce GTX 1080+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Any
